owl:Ontology.dc:contributors: Oscar Corcho (Universidad Politécnica de Madrid) http://orcid.org/0000-0002-9260-0753
owl:Ontology.dc:creator: Helena Bermúdez Sabel https://orcid.org/0000-0001-7782-206X
Mª Luisa Díez Platas https://orcid.org/0000-0002-9416-3147
owl:Ontology.dc:description: This ontological module contains classes and properties that provide information related to poetic works and their manifestations and other characteristics. It also provides transversal information that is ussefull in different specific domains related and covers different aspects to complete tehe information related with the poetic work The concepts dealt with are Person, Organization, Event, Place and Role
owl:Ontology.dc:title: POSTDATA core ontology
owl:Ontology.terms:publisher: POSTDATA Project “This project has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union’s Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement Nº [679528])” Principal Investigator. Elena González Blanco -- <https://orcid.org/0000-0002-0448-1812> Technical Director. Salvador Ros Muñoz -- <https://orcid.org/0000-0001-6330-4958>

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to an instance of Role who is affected by the current function (e.g. the role performed by an actress)
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: affects

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Level of education of the creator of a text/song (this property has as Domain "PoeticWork" and not "Person" since the education level of a person changes during time. This is the education level of the author in the moment of writing the poem)
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: authorEducationLevel

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The text unit belongs an ordered list of a textual units
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: belongsToListOrderedText

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Date of birth
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: birthDate

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to the Place which is the provenance of the current instance of Person
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: birthPlace

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Certainty of the date of birth
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: birthPlaceCertainty

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Level of confidence regarding the correspondent function
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: certainty

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to an ensemble, PoeticWork or Redaction which was authored by the current Creator
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: creates

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to an date entity that represents a particular point or period of time at which something happened or existed, or is expected to happen
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: date

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Date of death
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: deathDate

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to the instance of Place where the current Person has died
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: diedIn

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A person’s period of activity (to use when a range cannot be stablished; eg. “3rd century”)
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: floruit

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The gender of the Person
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: gender

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Type of art, literature or music characterized by a specific form, content and style
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: genre

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to a function (an instance of Role) that has somehow affected the item at hand (e.g. sponsor)
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasAgent

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to a group of characters, an instance of Agent( Organisation or Person) depicted in the text
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasCharacter

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to the entity Creator that has created the current work under analysis
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasCreator

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to the text (an instance of Redaction) which was dedicated to the current Person
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasDedication

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to the Person who has edited the current instance of Redaction
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasEditor

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to the first text unit which form the current element under analysis
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasFirstPart

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to one of the persons (instance of Person) who belongs to the current Organisation
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasMember

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: List of text units that form the redaction
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasOrderedTextList

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to one of the works (an instance of PoeticWork) which form the current element under analysis
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasPart

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A text unit in an ordered list.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasTextUnit

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to the specific location in a bibliographic item (an instance of Location) which contains a translation of the text at hand
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasTranslation

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to a Organisation, Person or Place which are related to the current instance of Event
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: involves

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to an instance of Role that affects the current role (e.g. actress who performs the role at hand)
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isAffectedBy

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to the work (instance of PoeticWork) which depicts the Role at hand in relation to its contents. When the Role at hand is related to the agents that participated in the transmission of the work (e.g. sponsor), this property points to the entity affected by the current function
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isAgentOf

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to one of the agents, almost always Person to whom the current Role belongs.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isAssignedTo

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: his property points to the text in which the current instance of Person or Organisatrion is a character
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isCharacter

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to a Person who died in the current instance of Place
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isDeathPlace

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This peroperty points to one of the persons (an instance of Person) to whom the current text was dedicated
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isDedicatedTo

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to the work (instance of PoeticWork) or a redaction which depicts the Role at hand in relation to its contents. When the Role at hand is related to the agents that participated in the transmission of the work (e.g. sponsor), this property points to the entity affected by the current function
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isDepicted

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to the specific location in a bibliographic item (an instance of Location) that contains an edition of the current instance of Redaction
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isEditedIn

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to an instance of Redaction which was edited by the the current Person
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isEditor

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to the container (an instance of Redaction) of which the item at hand is its first part
isFirstpart
This property points to the Place which is the provenance of the current instance of the item
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isFrom

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to the specific location in a bibliographic item (an instance of Location) in which the current text is indexed
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isIndexedIn

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to the Event in which the current instance of Organisation, Person or Place is referenced
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isInvolvedIn

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to the instance of Organisation to which the Person at hand belongs
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isMember

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to the text (an instance of Redaction) that records the current item under analysis
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isMentionedIn

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to the instance of Ensemble to which the PoeticWork at hand belongs
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isPart

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to an instance of Organisation that performs the current Role
This property points to one of the persons (instance of Person) to whom the current Role belongs
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isPerformedBy

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to a text (an instance of Redaction) which is one of the materialisations of the work under analysis
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isRealisedThrough

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to the specific location in a bibliographic item (an instance of Location) that registers the current item under analysis
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isRecordedBy

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to the specific location in a bibliographic item (an instance of Location) whose contents are related to the current item under analysis (usually, its specific bibliography)
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isReferencedIn

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to one of the texts (an instance of Redaction) which is an analytical version of the text at hand (the current Redaction)
isSynthesis
This property points to the Entity whose provenance corresponds to the current instance of Place
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isTheOrigin

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to another work (an instance of Redaction) from which the current item being analysed was translated
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isTranslated

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to another version (an instance of Redaction) which is a translation of the current item being analysed
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isTranslation

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Label of a time frame for grouping certain works. Cf. "school". The values of this property are defined in a controlled vocabulary about literary periods.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: literaryPeriod

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to an instance of Event or Person or Organisation or Place that is referred in the current under analysis
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: mentions

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to the next text unit which, together with the current item, form the same redaction
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: nextPart

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to one of the roles (an instance of Role) performed by the current Person or Organisation
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: performs

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Major literary genre of the composition, that is, drama or poetry. The values of this property are defined in a controlled vocabulary about poetic types
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: poeticType

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to the previous text unit which, together with the current item, form the same textual unit
previousPart
This property points to the Place which is the provenance of the current instance of Ensamble or Poetic Work
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: provenanceFrom

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to the work (an instance of Opus) of which the text at hand (the current Redaction) is a materialisation
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: realises

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Association of a person with a religion, denomination or sub–denominational religious group. The values of this property are defined in a controlled vocabulary about religious affiliation
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: religiousAffiliation

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to the specific location in a bibliographic item (an instance of Location) which contains the edition used as the base of text at hand
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: retrievesText

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Job performed by some agent (e.g. sponsor, actor, collector, singer, arranger, transcriptor)
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: roleFunction

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Literary movement/school of the author
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: school

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The social status of the Person, that is the position or rank of a Person within the society
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: socialStatus

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Type of character (eg. “main”, “antagonist”, etc.)
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: typeOfCharacter

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Type of designation/name. E.g. pseudonym, heteronym, allonym, orthonym variant
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: typeOfDesignation

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The type of textual element (e.g. part of a greater ensemble; part of a composed collection of poems; prologue of a work; epilogue of a work; a chapter of a work...)
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: typeOfTextualElement

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: This property points to another text (an instance of Redaction) which is a synthesis of the version at hand (the current Redaction)
usedForSynthesis
The altitude of a location. For example 37.42242 (WGS 84).
The latitude of a location. For example 37.42242 (WGS 84).
The longitude of a location. For example 37.42242 (WGS 84).

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: It contains an additional name component, such as a nickname, epithet, or alias, or any other descriptive phrase used within a personal name
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: addName

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A file (XML, PFD, plain text) which contains the Redaction and, likely, other type of analytical information
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: additionalFile

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Contains a postal address, for example of a publisher, an organisation, or an individual
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: address

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Alternative name that references the current item
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: altName

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Alternative name, other known denominations of a text or tune
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: altTitle

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The meant readership, viewers or listeners of a cultural product
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: audience

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Level of education of the recipients of a text/song
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: audienceEducationLevel

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: An account of a person's life written, composed, or produced by another
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: biography

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: An explanatory series of notes or comments; an explanatory essay or treatise on a text
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: commentary

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: An ethnic group; a social group that shares a common and distinctive culture, religion, language, or the like
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: ethnicity

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Text that narrates the event, that is, an excerpt of the Redaction
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: eventNarration

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The closing words of the composition (usually, the last verse)
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: explicit

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: It contains a forename, given or baptismal name
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: forename

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Purpose of the work (e.g. prayer, spell, curse)
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: function

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: It contains a name component used to distinguish otherwise similar names on the basis of the relative ages or generations of the persons named
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: genName

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The first line of the work
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: incipit

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Whether the Redaction was composed to be sung
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: isASong

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: In case the identity of current instance of Creator is unknown
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: isAnonymous

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A calligram is a text visually arranged in a way that it forms an image associated with the text’s contents
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: isCalligram

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Whether the person under analysis is a fictional character
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: isFictional

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: In case the identity of the current instance of Creator is certainly a wrong attribution
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: isWrongAttribution

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A significant or descriptive word. Usually, a word used as a reference point for finding other words or information
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: keyword

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Language of the text
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: language

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The arrangement of textual materials (images included) on a page
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: layout

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The literary tradition assigned to a composition
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: literaryTradition

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Contains a proper noun or noun phrase that refers the current agent
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: name

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Contains a connecting phrase or link used within a name but not regarded as part of it, such as van der or of
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: nameLink

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Location of the narrative
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: narrativeLocation

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: An ethnic group forming a part of one or more political nations
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: nationality

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Comment or explanations
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: notes

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Number of lines in item
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: numberOfLines

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Number of plays in item
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: numberOfPlays

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Number of poems in item
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: numberOfPoems

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Number of PrimarySources used in the elaboration of an edition
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: numberOfWitnessesUsed

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The language from which the Redaction/Poetic Work is a translation
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: originalLanguage

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Name of the place as it appears in the source text
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: originalName

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The identifying name of a text or tune as it appears in its PrimarySource
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: originalTitle

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The recasting of the contents in words different from that originally used, whether in the same language or in a translation
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: paraphrasis

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A fictitious name, especially a pen name. A variant name
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: penName

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: URL to a digital image file that depicts the person
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: portrait

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Contains a name component which indicates that the referent has a particular role or position in society, such as an official title or rank
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: positionName

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Function of a person or character. In a play, it is the part played by a performer
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: role

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Excerpt
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: sampleText

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Note about the source used to give a particular piece of information
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: sourceNote

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A secondary, usually explanatory title
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: subtitle

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Contains a family (inherited) name, as opposed to a given, baptismal, or nick name
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: surname

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Reference to textual contents . The contents of this property do not allow finer analysis by stanza or line. It can be a text of a diplomatic edition, semidiplomatic edition or of a critical edition (among others) or even a translation. The property typeOfRedaction defines the type of Edition or if it is a translation
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: text

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Subject of a text, song or image
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: theme

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Type of event, for instance its modality (real, fictional...)
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: typeOfEvent

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Type of place (e.g. fictional)
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: typeOfPlace

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The type of the text provided in the Redaction Eg.: Diplomatic edition, critical edition, translation
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: typeOfRedaction

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: There are references that mentioned a PrimarySource for the text at hand but the real textual artefact has not been identified
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: unidentifiedSource

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Primary sources of the text excluded during the elaboration of an edition (usually, dependent witnesses)
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: witnessesNotUsed

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Number that identifies the text, for instance, inside a collection
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: workNumber

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A summary of the resource.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: abstract

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Any agentive Object , either physical, or social.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Agent

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Function of a person or organization in the creation of a poetic work, redaction or other transmission element
owl:Class.rdfs:label: CreatorRole

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An abstract work that contains more than one Poetic Work. An Ensemble might be conceived as a collection of works, organized by author, by book song, by book of poems; or as a work mainly written in prose that contains more than one poetic pieces (each one of them being its own Poetic Work) Eg.: Les fleurs du mal
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Ensemble

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A thing that happens or takes place
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Event

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An ordered list of text units with a given length and indexed elements.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: OrderedTextUnitList

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Named collection of people regarded as a single unit Eg.: Typical examples include institutions such as ‘UNED’ or ‘the BBC’ and businesses such as ‘Google’ but also racial or ethnic groupings or political factions where these are regarded as forming a single agency such as ‘the Carthaginians’ or ‘the Communists’
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Organisation

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A human being regarded as an individual. This person could have existed in real life or it may be fictional. Eg.: D. Quijote de la Mancha
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Person

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A particular position, point, or area in space; a location
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Place

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Abstract concept of an artistic creation. In POSTDATA these creations must be in verse (poem, play, song) Eg.: Os Lusíadas by Luis Vaz de Camões; La Commedia by Dante; the poem Ad te deus by an Anonymous author written in between the 7th and 9th centuries
owl:Class.rdfs:label: PoeticWork

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Representatives of a work, that is, of an Poetic Work. Each version of a work is its own redaction. Eg.: The palaeographic edition of A solis ortu usque ad occidua preserved in Lat. 1154 (BNF) and its critical edition are two Redaction of the same Poetic Work
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Redaction

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Function of a person or character
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Role

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Text unit on an ordered list
owl:Class.rdfs:label: TextUnit
